attributes.action: That postumous knighthoods and other postumous awards are pointless.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Postumous kinghoods and other postumous awards whilst making the surviving friends and family feel warm and allows them to pat themselves on the back there is no real point as the person who recieves the award is dead.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
